addColumn

public void addColumn(java.lang.String columnName,
                      ColumnType columnType,
                      int sizeOfOneDatum)
Adds one column to the store, given its type, its name and the size of one datum.

Specified by:
addColumn in interface BWInterface
Parameters:
columnName - Name of the column, used to manipulate it (query, add ...)
columnType - Type of the column, has to be from the enum ColumnType: BWH or BWV
sizeOfOneDatum - Size of one datum in the column, depends on the data format of the column. Example: if the type is int, sizeOfOneDatum = 32.

addColumn

public void addColumn(BWColumn column)
               throws java.lang.Exception
Adds one column to the store giv.

Specified by:
addColumn in interface BWInterface
Parameters:
column - Column to add, has to match the length of the processor word of the store
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - thrown when the size of the processor word of the column given does not match the one of the store.
